short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gets rid of old classes on the Rose-Hulman Moodle and allows users to change the accent color.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*IMPORTANT*
*Currently doesn't work with the new Moodle! Will update when fixed.*

Allows users to hide unwanted classes on the Rose-Hulman Moodle page, as well as change the accent colors.
